param.name: xheight
param.label: Height of div
param.description: Height of the div will display

param.name: xwidth
param.label: Width of div
param.description: Width of the div will display

param.name: catid
param.label: Category
param.description: Display content of these categories only. separate by comma ','

param.name: mode
param.label: Mode display
param.description: Defines mode of the product will display.

param.name: show_price
param.label: Show Product Price?
param.description: Defines wether the product price is displayed or not.

param.name: show_addtocart
param.label: Show Add to cart?
param.description: Defines wether the Add to cart is displayed or not.

param.name: auto
param.label: Auto run slide
param.description: Defines auto run slide is auto or not.

param.name: zipjs
param.label: Use zip Javascript?
param.description: Defines Use zip Javascrip or not

param.name: delaytime
param.label: Rolling delay time
param.description: Time between two articles, in seconds

param.name: animationtime
param.label: Animation time
param.description: Time of an animation, in miliseconds
